PaymentRequestLine.name: PaymentRequestLine
PaymentRequestLine.description: Represents the line item details of the financial compensation request.

AdjustmentAmount.description: Adjustment amount for reasons such as copay, deductible, and coinsurance.

BenefitName.description: The name of benefit associated with the payment request line, such as Physical Therapy or Ambulance Transportation.

ClaimItemId.description: The claim item associated with the payment request line.

DiagnosticCodeId.description: The diagnostic code associated with the payment request line.

EndDateTime.description: The end date of services represented in the payment request line.

FacilityId.description: The facility associated with the payment request line.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the Payment Request Line.

PaymentRequestId.description: The payment request associated with the payment request line.

Quantity.description: Number of units the payment request line represents, such as number of days in hospital.

QuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the quantity field.

RequestedAmount.description: Amount that the requestor is seeking for payment, which is the service amount minus the adjustment amount.

ServiceAmount.description: Total service amount for the payment request line before adjustments.

ServiceCodeId.description: The service code associated with the payment request line.

ServiceProviderId.description: The service provider associated with the payment request line.

StartDateTime.description: The start date of services represented in the payment request line.

Status.description: The status of the payment request line.

UnitPrice.description: Unit Price for the quantity and quantity unit of measure.
